tool_description: DeFi Watch's API opens access to up-to-date data for thousands of cryptocurrencies. The API code is clear, developer-friendly, and provides daily and historical cryptocurrency information for each API request
name: DeFi Watch
title: DeFi Watch

api_list.name: WALLETS -> BALANCE BY CHAIN
api_list.description: Get wallet balance in USD by chain

required_parameters.name: chain
required_parameters.description: Select specific blockchain for wallet assets

required_parameters.description: Select specific blockchain for wallet assets

api_list.description: Get data about  tokens with market capitalisation and filter them

optional_parameters.description: Select specific sort type for sort field

optional_parameters.description: Select how much fields should take

optional_parameters.description: Select specific type of volatility for pools

api_list.name: POOLS -> GET POOL BY BLOCKCHAIN

api_list.description: Get information about all available blockchains
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://defi-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/chains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "defi-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://defi-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/chains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "defi-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BRIDGES
api_list.description:
Get access to verify data about cross-chain bridges by integrating Bridges API from DeFi Watch into the code. This solution offers links to bridges as well as information about fees and duration. The API code is user-friendly, clear and accessible. 

[![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52164830761_c7a2292634_b.jpg)](https://defi.watch/bridges)

optional_parameters.name: From
optional_parameters.description: Select blockchain name information from which you want to send

optional_parameters.name: To
optional_parameters.description: Select blockchain name information to which you want to send
